title: Banned due to suspect activity on my account ; is my password endangered?
body:
Hello there, sexy support members.
I've got a little problem : I've been temporarily banned from LoL due to suspect activity on my account. (It's in EU West, but I kinda figured I would get a faster answer here, and I think my problem concerns also many people here)
Earlier this day, I received an email saying I asked to change my password. I didn't.
It thus very much feels like I've been hacked. (I didn't receive an email explaining why I got banned, by the way)

So is my password in jeopardy? I've used it on a few other games, without thinking too much about it. It felt safe enough.
It appears it evidently isn't the case.
Was it stolen because it wasn't strong enough? If I amped it up severely and used the new password on other games, would the risk taken be the same?

Thanks for your answer !
